Type.Name: IOException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit IOException extends System.SystemException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when an I/O operation fails.

remarks.para: is the base class for exceptions thrown while accessing information using streams, files and directories.

block.para: The Base Class Library includes the following types, each of which is derived from :
Where appropriate, use these types instead of .

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: The constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An I/O error occurred while performing the requested operation." This message takes into account the current system culture.
The property of the new instance is initialized to .

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
